meanings.definition: Relating to the act of presenting something.
meanings.sent1: The presentational display was clear and easy to understand.
meanings.sent2: She gave a presentational speech at the conference.
meanings.sent3: The presentational magic show amazed the audience.
meanings.sent4: His presentational skills were like a master storyteller.
meanings.sent5: The presentational video tutorial made learning fun and engaging.

meanings.sent1: The presentational slides were informative and well-designed.
meanings.sent2: The presentational style of the report was professional.
meanings.sent3: The presentational outfit she wore was eye-catching.
meanings.sent4: His presentational approach was like a captivating performance.
meanings.sent5: The presentational brochure showcased the company's products beautifully.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to a presentation or presentation style.
meanings.sent1: The presentational software allowed for interactive slides.
meanings.sent2: The presentational skills workshop improved his confidence.
meanings.sent3: The presentational decorations transformed the room.
meanings.sent4: Her presentational flair added charm to the event.
meanings.sent5: The presentational design of the website was modern and appealing.
